name: Maximal Retrofitting
effect:
Allows a Flex, Main, Aux, or Aux/Aux mount to be linked to a Heavy mount
whenever the Heavy mount is used as part of an attack, the linked mount may be used as part of the attack as well but the weapons on it do not benefit from bonus damage.
(mark that mount manually, comp/con does not support applying a core bonus to two mounts)
mounted_effect: This mount is linked to a Heavy mount whenever that heavy mount is used as part of an attack, the linked mount may be used as part of the attack as well but the weapons on it do not benefit from bonus damage.

name: Flashprinter Module
description: By replacing mounts and deployables with flashprinter systems we can potentially allow for distributed deployment, given the right resources

name: E-T Conversion
effect: halve your frame's stress and double it's heat capacity
description: Running partially off of heat generated from systems
